displayProperties.description:
"How can you protect humanity if you do not know what it is like to be human? To revel in simple pleasures?" —Eva Levante
Each piece of event armor increases the strength of your Good Moods during the 2019 Revelry. Additional pieces can be found in the Verdant Forest or via bounties from Eva Levante.
displayProperties.name: Inaugural Revelry Grips

sourceString: Source: Earned during the seasonal Revelry event.
